elements.name: Add new email to test campaign scenario

steps.name: I am on Mautic Login Page
I type User Name on Login Page
I type Password on Login Page
I click Login Button
I should be on "Dashboard" Page
I visit "Emails" page
I should be on "Emails" Page
I click on Add New Email Button
I select email type as "Template"
I type email Suject as "TestEmailForCampaignScenario"
I type email Internal name as "TestEmailForCampaignScenario"
I click Save and Close Button on emails Page
I click Close Button on email page
I should see "TestEmailForCampaignScenario" email is created

elements.name: Add new company to test the campaign scenarios

steps.name: I am on Mautic Login Page
I type User Name on Login Page
I type Password on Login Page
I click Login Button
I should be on "Dashboard" Page
I visit "Companies" page
I should be on "Companies" Page
I click Add New Company Button
I type Company Name as "Acquia"
I click Save and Close Button on Companies Page
I should see Company is Created as "Acquia"

elements.name: Create a new stage to test the campaign scenarios

steps.name: I am on Mautic Login Page
I type User Name on Login Page
I type Password on Login Page
I click Login Button
I should be on "Dashboard" Page
I visit "Stages" page
I should be on "Stages" Page
I click Add New Button on Stages Page
I type Stages Title as "Stage 1"
I type Weight as "10" on Stages Page
I click Save and Close Button on Stages Page
I should see "Stage 1" Stages is created

I type Conact Last Name as "Test1"

elements.name: Add new segment based on Last Name to test campaign scenario

steps.name: I am on Mautic Login Page
I type User Name on Login Page
I type Password on Login Page
I click Login Button
I should be on "Dashboard" Page
I visit "Segments" page
I should be on "Contact Segments" Page
I click Add New Button on Contact Segments page
I type Segment Name as "segmentForCampaignRegression"
I Click on "Filters" tab on Contact Segments page
I choose Filter as "Last Name" on Contact Segments page
I choose Filter Condition as "equals" on Contact Segments page
I choose Filter Value as "Test1" on Contact Segments page
I click Save and Close Button on Contact Segments page
I should be see Contact Segment "segmentForCampaignRegression" is created

I click Save and Close Button on Contact Segments page

elements.name: Create a campaign with action send Email from the selected segment

steps.name: I am on Mautic Login Page
I type User Name on Login Page
I type Password on Login Page
I click Login Button
I should be on "Dashboard" Page
I visit "Campaigns" page
I should be on "Campaigns" Page
I click Add New Button on Campaign page
I type Campaign title as "sendEmail_Campaign_With_Segment"
I click on Launch Campaign builder
I select "Contact segments" as campaign source
I Select "segmentForCampaignRegression" as contact source and click on add
I click on campaign event list
I click on "Action" tab of campaign
I select action as "Send email" from actions list
I add event name "Send email to segment" and E-mail "TestEmailForCampaignScenario"

steps.name: I click on new campaign event after action
I click on "Decision" tab of campaign
I select decision as "Opens email" from decision list
I add event name "If user open's an Email"
I click on "yes" for condition
I click on "Action" tab of campaign
I select action as "Adjust contact points" from actions list
I add event name "Adjust contact points by 5" and add "5" points
I apply changes to builder and close the builder
I publish the campaign and save it
I wait for 12 sec to apply campaign action on segments contacts
I click on "Actions" tab
I check the first action tab that campaign is triggered successfully with "Send email to segment" and event "Send or schedule email" and success percentage "100%"
I check the second action tab that campaign is triggered successfully with "Adjust contact points by 5" and event "Adjust contact points" and success percentage "0%"
I click on "Contacts" tab
I click on first contact under campaign contacts
I check "Email sent" event is triggered for the contact
I check that events triggered successfully Event Name "TestEmailForCampaignScenario" and Event Type "Email sent" and Event Timestamp "Today"
I check the mailbox of "contact1" and verify that contact has received "TestEmailForCampaignScenario" email
I read the the email of "contact1" and delete it
I visit "Contacts" page
I should be on "Contacts" Page
I search for contact"Contact1 Test1"
I check that contact "Contact1 Test1" has received "5" points of reading an email
I visit "Campaigns" page
I should be on "Campaigns" Page
I search for campaign "sendEmail_Campaign_With_Segment"
I delete campaign "sendEmail_Campaign_With_Segment"
I should see campaign "sendEmail_Campaign_With_Segment" is deleted
